content.question: In line 21, “Divided joyes” most directly refers to

choices.label: gifts that are meaningless if not equally distributed between friends
situations in which one friend does not participate in the same joyful experience as another friend
the lonely feelings that arise when one friend refuses to visit another friend
experiences in which one friend’s joy comes at another friend’s expense

content.answer: situations in which one friend does not participate in the same joyful experience as another friend
